name: Houndour
description: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.  If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to fire-type moves.  Once this Pokémon has been hit by a Fire move, its own Fire moves will inflict 1.5× as much damage until it leaves battle.  This ability has no effect while the Pokémon is frozen.  The Fire damage bonus is retained even if the Pokémon is frozen and thawed or the ability is lost or disabled.  Fire moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This ability takes effect even on non-damaging moves, i.e. will o wisp.
abilities.description: Powers up if hit by fire.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.  Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
abilities.description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
